report.title: Far Sightedness
report.author: Liz
report.bodytext: So, I have taken LSD in the past, and had good and bad trips. I hadn't taken it in two years. Then, this summer I decided to drop one hit, which was supposedly pretty strong. I didn't trip that hard, but I had some visuals, and I smoked pot and I drank too. /n /n The trip ended after about 8 hours. That night, I smoked pot again, and I noticed, no visuals, but everything that was close up looked really blurry. I couldn't even read a book. I looked in the mirror and my pupils were very dialated, so I thought maybe the acid was like coming back, since I smoked. No big deal. /n /n Then, the next day, when I smoked pot it happened again. Now, I was getting kind of worried. I also noticed that when I wasn't high, I could not see close up very well. My pupils looked to be a normal size. I thought, maybe I have permanently damaged my vision and I was really worried. /n /n I told my mom about it, not that I took acid, but that I could not see close up, and she said that I might need bifocals. Bifocals at nineteen years old. I felt really bad. This went on for a few weeks. /n /n Luckily, my vision got better, and now I can see close up just fine. /n /n Thank God, because I was really worried that I did something to my eyes. I will be more careful from now on!
